notes: Another interesting pattern in Sakha is that in sentences where the passive morpheme has been attached, the theme can be optionally marked ACC. Allows purpose clauses, agent-oriented adverbs, and instrumental phrase: chaasky-ny sorujan eotyje-nen aljat-ylyn-na: cup-ACC intentionally hammer-INS break-PASS-PST.3SG
ru: the cup was intentionally broken with a hammer
